title: Replace Rabbit
subtitle: The family replaces the neighbor's bunny after their dog kills him.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The family dog runs into the yard with the body of their pet neighbor's rabbit in his jaw. The owners of the dead rabbit wash and dry it to show him life, then sneak into the neighbor's yard and take him back to his cage. The neighbors are terrified when they discover that a sick person dug their rabbit (he died the day before) and put him back in the cage.
